page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: The area around{Thorpe-on-the-hill}is mainly agricultural land used for growing wheat and barley.Some of the land is used for grazing cattle,sheep and woodland. The main settlement is Thorpe-on-the-Hill which is in square three.This village has a population of 792.The other village in this area is {Haddington}which is a very small village with a population of about thirty.The only other village in the area is{Morton}(it is only partly in the area) The Roman road,the{Fosseway,}runs through the area passing below Thorpe. The village of Thorpe has two churches and one primary school.Thorpe has very few local amenities considering its size.
